Direct Energy Solar <http://www.directenergysolar.com>
Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
Get a Career in Solar.
{{lead.First Name:default=Friend}}, our team is growing. We’re hiring in Massachusetts!
We’re excited to announce that Direct Energy Solar is growing quickly, and we are looking for qualified and motivated candidates in all areas of the company including sales, installation, project leadership, system design, quality assurance, customer service and management.
We’re looking to hire the best and brightest to join our innovative team and contribute to the future of solar energy and the homes and businesses of tomorrow. Wouldn’t it be cool to make a difference in people’s lives and empower them to use the sun to help save money? Well, that’s what it’s like every day Direct Energy Solar. Our team is passionate about solar power, and in a competitive solar market, we strive to provide the premier customer experience. Our friendly employees are at the heart of what makes our company great.
Interested? Join us at a career fair! <http://www.solarcareers.com>
We will have hiring managers present to meet attendees and schedule interviews, so please bring your resume. Refreshments will be provided. In addition, all attendees from our career fairs on August 12, 13, and 15 will be entered to win $1,000 gift card!
Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
